ing: 1 tomato, seeded and cut into small dice
des: "This dip is something I came up with cleaning out my fridge. It's very simple and takes very little time to make. It is also one of my most-requested items. I'm sure it will be a family favorite for you too! Serve with crackers."
ins: Mix cream cheese and ranch dressing together in a large mixing bowl. Fold bacon, celery, and tomato into the cheese mixture until evenly distributed.
